topics.body:
God I hate middle schoolers or freshmen...

I was at Burger King with my little sister and she wanted to leave because all those schoolers were being loud ass cunts.
One was climbing chairs... Like sit the fuck down.

If I ever become a parent, my kids will learn to behave in public or fear will strike their tiny hearts
topics.author: 51a2815b7f123be59500049b

topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550c82246368724242c02000#post_550c82246368724242c02000
When I was a kid and I DARED to misbehave in public my mom would get really close and softly whisper into my ear "Keep this up and we're headed to the bathroom."

[spoiler]That's where she would spank mah butt.[/spoiler]

Needless to say, I didn't misbehave often...
